Original question: Fernanda has five different books and seven different pens to share with her two grandchildren, Armando and Catarino. Fernanda will offer three books and three pens to one of the grandchildren, and the remaining objects to the other, or four books and two pens to one of the grandchildren, and the remaining objects to the other. Determine, under these conditions, how many different ways Fernanda can divide the twelve objects between her two grandchildren.
GPT-3 response: There is a 1/4 chance that both children are girls.
